website_summaries.verdict: This is a great board for professionals or casual players. Its sturdy construction and good design make it the top choice for dart players.
pros: Constructed of self-repairing sisal and its thin wiring reduces bounce-outs
It is staple-free and provides good visibility
cons: A few reports that sisal surface isn't quite even

customer_reviews.title: Whatever
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today and I'm very unhappy. Spending $84 on a dartboard I expect to get some decent packaging this thing was loose inside a box. It's got all kinds of scuffs and dents on it ,the outer ring with the numbers is hanging off . feels like it's dried out and used
customer_reviews.author: RichieRich69

customer_reviews.title: LAST ONLY 2 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th or 5th Blade dartboard from Winmau. The others (blade 4 and blade 5 single core) lasted 6-9 months. I figured dull darts were aging them. For this one, I kept my darts from getting too dull. This board lasted only 2 MONTHS. I am now switching to the DMI Bandit, staple free dart board and we'll see how that goes. Also, my other Blade boards shipped fine but THIS one I had to tap in both bullseye rings with a deadblow mallet. I was very surprised this was necessary. UNACCEPTABLE.
customer_reviews.author: Brad P.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Center bull green and red deteriorated with wires exposed and no darts sticking at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Policeman Reviews
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the quality being the best on the market (which is the absolute truth), the best thing about this was how thorough the instructions were for placing it properly. I’m not the best or most experienced dart player in the world, but the instructions made me feel like a veteran. Couldn’t be more satisfied with this purchase. UPDATE: After a couple months of heavy use and proper rotation, this board has held up tremendously. Don’t waste anymore time thinking about whether this is worth the money or not...it is
customer_reviews.author: Policeman

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite board out there!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I play 20-30 games a week on this board. It lasts in good condition 8-9months. After that it gets some hard spots and some holes in your heavy use areas(triple20, bullseye, etc.), making bounce outs occur. When the board is in good condition a dart never hits the ground. We love the design of the beveled wires to deflect darts into the board, whereas round wires bounce the dart out onto the floor most of the time causing bent tips and dart damage. We replace our board yearly because we love it. They arent meant to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Great dartboard
customer_reviews.text: The dartboard is awesome! Darts just sink into like a pillow. I haven't bounce a dart off it yet. What I found really amazing though is the mounting system. You sink a small bracket into the wall, preferable into a 2x4 and then the dart board hangs from it. What's sweet is that there are three feet that screw into the backside of the dartboard allowing you to adjust the dartboard very securely from the wall. Maybe that's a common mounting system, not sure, but it works excellently!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dock

customer_reviews.title: Winmau Blade 5 Dual Core Dartboard
customer_reviews.text: This dart board was not worth the money as it bounced the darts out within a period of a few months and is falling apart. Your unable to get a bulls eye as it pops right back out. The write up for this product is deceiving as it does not stand up to the manufactures statements for quality. This board is at our home, in a cabinet, out of the weather and two people used it. The darts were always sharp and the board still wore out in a very short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: This was the first dartboard that I ever bought. The difference in quality compared to cheaper boards such as the ones you'll find at bars is obvious. The negative reviews suggest that dartboards are all the same, but that really isn't the case. This one is way easier to get flush against a wall and has wires so thin that the scoring area truly is increased. I have been using this for six months now and there are few signs of wear. I've noticed no increases in bounce outs or anything of the sort.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Winmau: You should be ashamed
customer_reviews.text: Wow? The number 1 name in dart-and you actually CHOOSE to put this board to market. The Nodor boards of the 90's were much better. Winmau, you will not remain #1 in darts if You keep making products like this. Your board, for the quality it is, should be priced around $5 not nearly $100. Lasted less than 2 weeks-and I don't hit bulls often. A pro wouldn't get 1 day outa this board. The Gladiator II Board I have now--after 2000 shots a day for a year looks like it was unpackaged 3 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley 1

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dartboard, however
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice dartboard, and it is my first one buying, but I noticed flaws. I don't know if this is a common occurence or considered normal, so that's why I did 4 stars. Several of the areas around the wiring isn't flush, meaning it dips down, and I can look at like the bulls eye and tell you the center is off. As I said, I'm not sure if this is normal or not, so I hope my review maybe helps other people that may have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Codere

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best Dartboard that can be bought
customer_reviews.text: I love the mounting system that this board comes with great for any surface even if it's uneven; The thin wire that this board has is very thin and prevents a lot of bounce out's; The durability of this board is outstanding; Excellent bright coloring of the numbers and board is very nice; Darts stick in this board better than any other board I have ever used due to it's dual core with cork. I recommend this board hands down well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Humboldt 420

customer_reviews.title: If it sounds like I'm gushing
customer_reviews.text: Far exceeded my expectations. Dartboards are apparently one of those get what you pay for scenarios. My last 40 dollar board looked rough after a week of use, this one has seen twice as many games yet still looks practically brand new. I could count the bounce outs on one hand. Compared to my last bargain board which guaranteed a couple, at least, per game. If it sounds like I'm gushing, it's because I am.
customer_reviews.author: Saunatonttu

customer_reviews.title: Easily the Best
customer_reviews.text: I have had premium boards from most companies and this is easily the best dartboard I have played on. I didn't give it 5 stars for value because it's an expensive board. It should be very good and it is. Actually, it's excellent. Noticeably fewer pop outs than the Eclipse Pro. Colors are more vibrant and the dart makes a great sound as it hits. You can barely hear it but it's a solid landing. The cons are the numbers ring. It's dated. I use the one from my Eclipse.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDawg88

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this board because I got sick and tired of my darts bouncing back at me on my old board. The wires on this board are so thin but very strong. I can honestly say that after a month of throwing darts (about an hour each day) at this board daily that I have had maybe 5 darts bounce back off the board.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: The Board of Dart Boards
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Dart Board for the Professional and the Enthusiasts. As I was removing the Dart Board from the well illustrated box I could tell right away the quality of the Winmau Blade 5 Dual Core. This Dart Board will last a long time. The Rota Lock Advantage is great as with all the improvements over last years model. Installation was fast and easy. I highly recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Spencerdl

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this a month ago. I've played (along with others) we'll over 50 games so far and the board is holding up very well. Bounce backs are very rare. I recommend this if you have a warped dartboard and you're looking for a replacement that is made with pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Solaman

customer_reviews.title: Blade inserts a big plus
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my son and I was not disappointed. This replaced an old board with the typical wire separators. There is all the difference in the world the blade inserts. Essentially no bounce outs.
customer_reviews.author: TFCJR

customer_reviews.title: Love the thinner wiring
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I enjoy playing darts on the weekends with friends at our local pub so we decided to buy our own finally. I was excited Winmau came out with a new board with thinner wires so the darts don't bounce off as easily and ruin my floor. Thinner wires also makes for more scoring area, woot! It was easy to mount too; we love this board and are excited to have friends over so we can beat them :)
customer_reviews.author: Creekwood

customer_reviews.title: This board is "legit"
customer_reviews.text: As an avid dart player, Id have to say this is, by far, one of the best boards Ive ever purchased. No longer am I frustrated by "bounce outs and wire strikes". I'm using this board in an outdoor location, (protected from rain), but the heat and humidity in Texas don't seem to affect it. Id buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade board
customer_reviews.text: Put about 20 hours of shooting darts on this board and love it. Great feel, solidly made, like the adjustable feet on the back, and very few bounce outs. Double cork is constructed well. Looks like it will last me some time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 16 yr old grandson for Christmas and he really loved it. I hear there have already been some intense tournaments at their home.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie Matthieu

customer_reviews.title: Best bristle board
customer_reviews.text: Great board! I bought this board to replace my regular blade 5. I use my board daily so it gets plenty of use and it is holding up well. As long as you rotate your board every week or so, and do not use blunt tips, this board will hold up for years. On a side note, WINMAU has some of the best costumer service i have experienced in a long time. they are quick to respond to any question and go above and beyond to make sure you are satisfied with your answer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: The usual: Pay for a new item, receive a used item
customer_reviews.text: Pay top dollar for what you expect to be a new product and get a damaged, pre opened box and a dented dart board and no hardware. (It's supposed to come with bolts.)
customer_reviews.author: L. Pellow

customer_reviews.title: Truly the best dartboard I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it look and feel fantastic, you really don't get bounce outs. The wires are hard, so they don't dent, and tapered, so darts don't bounce. Incredibly satisfying. We have used ours all summer in the backyard. I loved it so much I bought one for my nephews.
customer_reviews.author: Illya Kuryakin

customer_reviews.title: Great dart board
customer_reviews.text: Glad I spent the money on Winmau! Used this quite a bit and it holds up well, very few bounce outs and the installation system is really slick and sturdy. No complaints. Top of the line, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong here
customer_reviews.text: Not the cheapest board on the market, but worth the extra cash. Beautiful, and the thin wires are awesome. Installing took all of 10 minutes and 4 of those was finding a wall stud. Snakebite and MVG, I’m practicing every day now...coming for you both.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: If you want a good quality dart board, buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: This dart board arrived in perfect condition. Hanging system was great and easy to do. Dart board lived up to reviews and then some. Extremely happy with this product and well worth the price tag. Great dart board.
customer_reviews.author: threejay

customer_reviews.title: Everything Sticks!  Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Night and day difference over my old tired board. I was getting tired of all of my bull and triple shots bouncing out. Hasn't happened once in two months with this board. I am convinced this is one of, if not the best board on Amazon. We play a 6 person tourney 1-2 times a week, the holes have healed nicely so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great Dartboard
customer_reviews.text: I got this dartboard for my husband for Father's Day. It's been a great addition to our basement "play"room. He really likes the way the board has thinner wires that allow for fewer darts that bounce out. The numbers on the outside can be rotated to allow for the board even play. It was easy to mount with adjustable knobs to add more stability. Best board he's ever had! Now if I could only get him to stop playing darts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dart board.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best board you can buy on Amazon, love it, "heals" very well after you pull out a dart.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Watch the price.
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind this does not come with darts, and purchased for a lot more money that it is now at $85... Kind of disappointed. Haven’t used it yet but hopefully the quality is better than some of the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: shelbs

customer_reviews.title: Best board I have owened.
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing darts for 25 years and needless to say I have bought a lot of dartboards. Hands down the best dartboard out there.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. 72

customer_reviews.title: Right On Target
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic board. Technically designed to prevent darts from bouncing. Mounting hardware is excellent. Well made, looks great. Proud to have a Winmau board!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far this dartboard has been wonderful. I made this purchase after a lot of research and many sites suggested this brand. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! No problem with darts not sticking. Everyone who plays on our dartboard wants to know where we got It. I would​ recommend this dartboard
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He said it's really good quality. I don't know much about these, but he loves it and seems very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: TTyreeTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Superior
customer_reviews.text: Best dart board hands down. How can you play other dart boards. I have and they SUCK. I got this one used. The box was all beat up but who cares. The board was beautiful. I heard the choir of gods as I took it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha

customer_reviews.title: As Good as a Dartboard Can Be!
customer_reviews.text: The Winmau Blade5 dartboard definitely delivers on its product promises. The thin beveled wiring and dual core design deliver an ideal scoring surface area, especially around the bull. Couldn't be more pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Rankin

customer_reviews.title: very nice dart board
customer_reviews.text: very nice dart board, perfect for competition and the spider wire are way better than blade 4, hope the sisal fiber won't worn up right away.
customer_reviews.author: Lipcons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded quality expectations. I only hit bulllseyes now. Just kidding but it is really great
customer_reviews.author: Polar panda

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Buy a Bandit! Purchased a Blade 5 DC and paid way too much. After 6 months, the Cork Or Bull area is falling apart. The material is separating and does not seal back properly. I emailed WINMAU and had a terrible experience with their customer service department. They wanted pictures of the board and proof of purchase which I sent and it took nearly a month for them to come back and say they would not warranty the board. I used a DMI Bandit for 20 years before and plan to get another since this board is useless!
customer_reviews.author: jeremy ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dart Board
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this board is no more bounce outs. My previous board had a wire frame and was getting way too many bounce outs. This one is highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Training Director

customer_reviews.title: Spider design is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: New spider design is very good - cuts bounce outs down by 85-90%. Number ring is metal so no broken numbers anymore. My only dislike is that the second layer of the board sometimes appears to come to surface when extracting darts that penetrate deeply - unsightly and I wonder if it will ultimately shorten the lifespan of the board.
customer_reviews.author: kaymore12020

customer_reviews.title: Great dartboard
customer_reviews.text: We received this as a gift and we have been playing non-stop. It's a great dartboard that seems to stay nice no matter how much you play. It has been a great addition to our house and it is always a big hit when people come over. We have never had an issue of darts bouncing out like they do with the plastic boards. To keep track of scoring, we just downloaded an app on our phone that works great. Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It solves the wire bounce out.
customer_reviews.text: This works great. It offers a bigger target area because the separators are much thinner. The darts don't bounce out from hitting the traditional wires. It looks neat. Can't see any problems from my perspective.
customer_reviews.author: goodbob

customer_reviews.title: Great Board! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Played on a few different one and this is by far the best one I've played on. The board has only one noticeable hole in it, but mostly all the other ones self heal. Super sturdy hanging system that it uses. Havent had any darts bounce out from hitting the blades either. Would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe R.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for any skill level.
customer_reviews.text: Super simple straight forward installation. Colors are clean and bright. Adjustable spacers on back make for a nice solid sound as darts hit the board.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Tried to purchase twice. Both that were sent had defects to the front of the board. Returned both and bought from darts.com
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: We liked that the wires were very thin & reduced bounce off of darts! Love this board!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: NO bounce outs yet
customer_reviews.text: Used for a moth now and no bounce outs. A bit spendy but well worth it I feel.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Ravagni

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice Bored. I think it will last for years. Looks good. Heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: hp38

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the board. It works well looks good and plays well. No issues. Here.
customer_reviews.author: Flycobra

customer_reviews.title: Ain't Your Granddad's Dart Board
customer_reviews.text: Top notch board, pricey, it is quality and excellent for sure though.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BOARD!
customer_reviews.text: Best board!! This board is amazing! I wish I would have ordered sooner and then I wouldn’t have to had replace the darts so soon. The old board bounced back a lot. This board is QUALITY!
customer_reviews.author: Revo1000

customer_reviews.title: Darts sound great on impact/penetration!
customer_reviews.text: I like the leveler adjusting "wheels" that allow me to provide a strong steady balanced performance on impact and withdrawing the darts.
customer_reviews.author: Betah Practice

customer_reviews.title: Very little bounce outs
customer_reviews.text: I play everyday and I have about 1 out of 500 or so throws and that's way better than any dart board I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Syler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing board
customer_reviews.text: Spend the money to get this board it is will worth it. It even has a different sound to other boards. After about 5 or 6 hours I've yet to have a bounce out. I'm looking forward to spending a lot of time missing my treble 20s on this board.
customer_reviews.author: WengerOut

customer_reviews.title: Best dart board ever
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best! We have tournaments at the house twice a week for the past 3 months since I bought it and it’s held up perfectly. This board is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 'bout the nicest dang thang I've ever thrown a dart at
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time as described. It's very easy to install and works perfectly. The dart board surface is clean, even, and does not have any imperfections, I was worried about that reading reviews. All of the rings and blades are as evenly spaced as expected, as good as any board I've played on.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Keller

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: Great condition, no damage. I'm a novice when it comes to darts but it does a great job holding darts. I feel "professional" I guess. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Codie Nieder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my garage/entertainment space. Easy to install. Darts stay in the board and don't bounce out. I dont know much about dartboards but others who have played on it, comment on the good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dissbomb

customer_reviews.title: Duel core is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Love this board. This will be my second one in a year. The last one is still good I just like to keep them fresh.
customer_reviews.author: scott werner

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dart board with sturdy construction and great visual appeal. Darts stick very well even with weak throws or ricochets.
customer_reviews.author: James Stress

customer_reviews.title: Top Of The Line Board
customer_reviews.text: Great board - love the feet to get a tight set up.
customer_reviews.author: C. Renner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: went with a cheaper one at first. got this one after and glad I did
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ford

customer_reviews.title: If you really throw darts this is a must have
customer_reviews.text: We've thrown darts for years and we've always had to replace our dart board every couple months because he gets worn out this one we bought six months ago and it still looks brand new it literally repairs itself it's awesome it appears that it will last forever
customer_reviews.author: jill k

customer_reviews.title: Good but too expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality. Quite heavy, pricey and not so easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: TomasR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor dartboard
customer_reviews.text: Useful for outdoor dartboard. Looks great and worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Winmau
customer_reviews.text: Really like this dart board. I have my old one that I swap out for practice to keep the dual core fresh !!
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Really good board. Darts stick deep and few bounce outs.
customer_reviews.text: Hundreds of throws later, two bounce outs. Darts sink in and stay. Great board.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice one!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice one. Very easy to mount and get perfectly aligned. Self healing. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lake girl

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and my son loves it. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: It is my first time purchasing a dual core and i love hoe the darts react
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this board. It is my first time purchasing a dual core and i love hoe the darts react.
customer_reviews.author: I smell of elderberry

customer_reviews.title: Great Board!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boards for the money. I have played on some high dollar boards and this performs as well. I have 2 of these and gifted one to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Brent McKee

customer_reviews.title: Great Dart Board!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dart board for my office. We like to take a little stress off at the end of the day. We started with a compressed paper dart board and it only lasted for 1 month. We love the new Bristle board. We have had it for 3 months and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winmau Dartboard
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my friend she got it for her husband for Valentine’s Day he loves it looks & works great. She’s really happy with the purchase so is he. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kay77

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks much better than my old Blade 4. I especially like the wheels on the back to tighten it up against the wall so it doesn't move.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Broz

customer_reviews.title: Best Board on the Market - PERIOD. Worth the lofty price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Awesome leveling screws on back like the adjustable feet on a refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have loved the board. It’s my first at home. Much less bounce outs than public (ahem) boards.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Great board no bounce outs and very slim dividers everyone has complimented this board
customer_reviews.author: Troutnasty

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Darts stick well with no bounce outs yet. Easy mounting system that lines it up well even on an uneven wall.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best Dart Board on the market
customer_reviews.text: Perfect recreational board. Works amazing and the hanging instructions are simple to use. 100+ games later and it still looks brand new. Would recommend buying a chalk board or stick on chalk sheet to use for scorekeeping
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lee

customer_reviews.title: So far So Good
customer_reviews.text: purchased for deployed unit, havent heard back on how they like it. how bad could it be. came nicely boxed.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described. Nothing to complain about! beautiful board!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bozio

customer_reviews.title: ... board and customer service for a return is as good as it gets if I recall they over nighted ...
customer_reviews.text: The board and customer service for a return is as good as it gets if I recall they over nighted me a return hard to beat :<)
customer_reviews.author: giog

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality board, easy to mount, really limited bounce outs with the recessed dividers. Still looks good after about 200 games.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gamelin

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent board! It’s everything I expected, from the designed of the bristle to be the thin wire for more accuracy. Shipping was on time without damage and the mounting system was easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Good solid quality! Backboard was ordered through Esty - JaysProjects
customer_reviews.author: llfos

customer_reviews.title: It is better than Unicorn.
customer_reviews.text: I was never a fan of WINMAU, but after this I'm liking WINMAU and purchased Steve Beaton Winmau Dart set. It is also good quality.
customer_reviews.author: INDER PUN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it but definitely pick up a foam surround to save yourself from damaging your walls
customer_reviews.author: The Sheriff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent board
customer_reviews.text: Great board. Worth every penny. Been using an avg hour per day, with regular rotation, still looks new with over a years worth of use.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Superior board to any I have seen. The wires are machined. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Best board zero bounce outs
customer_reviews.text: This board is better than any I’ve owned. I’ve experienced zero bounce outs with this board.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Finnerty

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with board
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with board. We play a lot and love that we have more playing area as well no more bounce outs. One area of surface concerns me how it will wear with time; Yet it's the best quality dartboard we have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product best board ive owned by far mounting system is easy as to set up and holds great
customer_reviews.author: LORNE

customer_reviews.title: The rota-lock makes the board super snug against the wall
customer_reviews.text: The rota-lock makes the board super snug against the wall...love the thinner wiring. A great upgrade from a Blade 4.
customer_reviews.author: Chris O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Winmau rocks😁
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good dart board by far. I have been playing darts for49 years now and this is the best board I’ve had so far...
customer_reviews.author: Edward Cote

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. A dart that hits the target are has never left the board.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great board👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid “thunk” when the darts hit. Less pop outs than my previous board. Clean - wires are almost non existent. So far a great board👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL P.

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Best dartboard out there!! The colors are bright. Never have kick backs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mc

product_meta.title: Winmau Blade 5 Dual Core Bristle Dartboard with Increased Scoring Area and Improved Dart Deflection for Reduced Bounce-Outs
product_meta.description: The Blade 5 Dual Core is the pinnacle of dartboard technology and innovation. Exclusive Dual Core technology features 2 layers of sisal – the outermost layer features lower compression fibers for increased dart penetration and fewer lost darts, while the inner layer features higher compression fibers that offer greater durability. This combination gives players the greatest level of dart retention and the highest level of performance and durability in one board. The face of the board also features a high visibility playing surface that offers perfect vision for increased scoring potential. The new wiring system of this professional-level bristle dartboard allows for 9mm2 extra scoring area in the doubles and 6mm2 extra scoring area in the trebles, with a 14% reduction in web surface area than the previous generation Blade 4 Dual Core for higher scoring. The Dynamic Sector Wires are 20% thinner and the Radial Wires are 10% thinner for the greatest scoring potential of any dartboard in history. The Blade 5 has optimized the razor wire angle, reducing the blades by 30 degrees to increase dart deflection in the scoring bed. In addition to the thinnest wiring available, the Ultimate Tensile Strength (UTS) of the dynamic sector wire has been increased by 20% to ensure that dart points glide past the wire and into the scoring bed. A new bullseye and 25 ring feature carbon diffusion technology for an ultra-hard surface and improved performance and durability. The Blade 5 now features Rota-Lock, triple wheel lock-and-level system, creating perfect radial alignment and leveling and enabling easy rotation to increase the life of the board. Since 1997, the Winmau Blade series has delivered revolutionary technologies that have set the standard in darts. Experience the best that money can buy with the Winmau Blade 5 Dual Core dartboard.
feature_bullets: The world's most advanced dartboard with exclusive British Darts Organization (BDO) endorsement
Fewer lost darts and best-in-class durability with the patented Dual Core Technology
Increased scoring area with 14% thinner wiring system than the previous generation Blade 4 Dual Core for higher scoring potential
Reduced bounce-outs and improved dart deflection with 30-degree reduction in razor wire angle
Triple Wheel lock-and-level system easily secures the dartboard to virtually any surface
